column4: anyone know how to make a manual IP stick after reboots? and DNS entries?
have you poked the NetworkManager applet?
poked it? I've opened it and put it in, but then I rebooted (after using apt-get for updates) and the IP and DNS didn't stick
oh. if you've already tried setting up the static ip in nm-applet, try doing it in /etc/network/interfaces instead
